note:
Howdy! I'm a Jack of All Trades (mostly technical stuff). I like tech, (reverse) engeneering, internet mysteries, and coffee. highSchool = true. Lives in 🇺🇸, 🇲🇽 heritage, is 🏳️‍🌈 & mildly furry.

You may know me as reboot_hasstuff (Twitter), Reboot_is_Confusion (Reddit), reboot-codes (YT), Reboot-Codes (github), or RebootPlays (steam).

The sync thing broke (understandably). Working on a *different* one that'll use twitter's CDN instead of uploading to the instance. Check github!
